授業目的: The purpose of this special course lecture for students of KGU is to study evolutionary molecular engineering (EME) and understand how EME can originate novel biological information in the basic science (title of Nobel Prize 2018 Chemistry) and provide seed candidates for the applied science. A special focus at the end of this couse is to describe hybrid bio-electrochemical sensor and its use for SDGs.
到達目標: Students will acquire an understanding of a) the field of Evolutionary Molecular Engineering b) the process of in vitro directed evolution of proteins c) the integrated application of (a) and (b) with electochemistry to achieve SDGs
授業方法: This lecture will be delivered using computer and projector. Hard prints will also be distributed. At the end of each topic during this course, questions and discussion will be welcomed from the side of students and will be used as credit/score evaluation.
